pages.text:
Owner Michael Palmer started serving Saint Cloud when he was 14 at his father’s sub shop that was also located in our town. Mike got the itch to make something of his own. We are so thankful he did! They started with just a Hotdog Cart & began turning an old run down Texaco Gas Station into what would become a local favorite/staple in the growing town of Saint Cloud.
After tons of hard work, long nights Mutts finally opened its doors in Jan 2010 winning that years
BEST
Burger & Hotdog in Osceola County. What a way to start the opening year! Not only was the food award winning but Mike staffed the restaurant with an amazing crew who make you feel like family.
Our small town burger shop with big taste & fresh ingredients continued to take home
BEST
Burger,
14 years in a row
! We are so grateful to have amazing repeat customers & new faces that keep Mutts as a Lunch or Dinner destination.
We have an ‘A La Carte’ menu selection so you can build your meal however you like, a variety of Novelty sodas to wash it down & a delicious selection of something sweet to finish off any meal… Or start one! Our Thick 6oz patties, Fresh Cut Fries fried in
Beef Tallow
and Thick Milkshakes will keep you coming back every time!
With all the change & growth in our town, Mutts will remain the go-to for your burger cravings & Best Cheat Meal in Osceola County.
Serving
LOVE, PEACE & BURGER GREASE!
FAQ – FREQUENTLY asked Questions
Are you going to Start Serving Philly’S?
NO
Are you going to reopen philly?
NO
Are we a Dog Groomers?
NOPE
Contact us
We would love to hear from you! We are always available, stop in, fill out the form or email us directly at
Contact@mutts13th.com
Please be as detailed as possible in your message so we can give you the best response.
